wobani.resources.spline

Class CubicSpline

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.resources.spline.SimpleSpline
      • wobani.resources.spline.CubicSpline
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable, Resource, Spline
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BezierSpline, CatmullRomSpline

    public abstract class CubicSpline
extends SimpleSpline
    This class extends SimpleSpline to it can store a cubic spline based on a 4x4 basis matrix.

      • computeSplineData

        @NotNull
protected float[] computeSplineData()
        Description copied from class: SimpleSpline
        Returns the splie's data based on the control points and the type of the spline. Also computes the AABB and the bounding sphere.
        Overrides:
        computeSplineData in class SimpleSpline
        Returns:
        the spline's data

      • getStep

        public float getStep()
        Returns the step. The lower the number, the smoother the spline.
        Returns:
        step

      • setStep

        public void setStep(float step)
        Sets the step to the given value. The lower the number, the smoother the spline.
        Parameters:
        step - step
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - step must be higher than 0 but it can't be higher than 1
